Author Topic VickyS Member
USA 44 Posts
Posted - 03/24/2006 : 11:24:08 PM I am wondering now if I am the only one who received an email entitled: CERTIFIED FIELD ASSOCIATE RATING PROGRAM
This was a survey from Certified Reports (techsupport)
It seems they want to start rating their shoppers (like USDA prime beef) and test shoppers to determine if they are competent.
I would appreciate if anyone else received this message.
Thanks.
